author: Kevin Berge
title: WWE Raw Results: Winners, Grades, Reaction and Highlights from April 6
description: WWE WrestleMania 36 set the future of Monday Night Raw. A few key results had a chance to change WWE completely going forward going into the April 6 edition.   Drew McIntyre won the WWE Championship toppling  Brock Lesnar ...
content:
Credit: WWE.com
WWE WrestleMania 36 set the future of Monday Night Raw. A few key results had a chance to change WWE completely going forward going into the April 6 edition.
Drew McIntyre won the WWE Championship toppling Brock Lesnar. His victory over The … [+806 chars]
